column1: Sayan is a city and municipality in the Surat district in the Indian state of Gujarat.  It is one of the primary industrial area of Surat Metropolitan Region.  Sayan is located on NH 228 only 18 km from Surat. Sayan is also connected by state highway with Kathor village on NH-8.  It is famous for its sugar factories. The majority of the population residing in Sayan are the native Kolis.
